name: PFA Koncernen
goal: The largest provider of pillar II pensions in the Danish market. The Group consists of PFA Holding, PFA Pension, PFA Asset Management, PFA Bank, PFA Alternative Investment Fund and a number of real estate funds.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation
euInitiatives: PEPP, Capital Markets Union, IDD, MiFID, CRD, MiFir, all regulation relating to the Financial sector/Financial services.
